title: Make Mate 1
overview: Make Mate 1 is a program that contains the meaning of "Time to become one with MAKE friends (MATE) to create the stage you dreamed of," and it is a program that depicts the process of 36 multinational participants running toward their dream of becoming an idol. It is not a survival program involving trainees belonging to an entertainment agency but a survival program performed by ordinary boys who do not have an agency. The final debut group will debut as Makestar's new boy group.
